### News
#### Talk by Dr. Edzer Pebesma at UZH
On Tuesday September 13th, 10:00-11:00, Dr. Edzer Pebesma is giving a talk
about Reproducible Research at the University of Zurich, Irchel campus. He is
well known in the R spatial community. The abstract can be found
[here](http://www.geo.uzh.ch/microsite/reproducible_research/poster/GIUZ_Pebesma_abstract.pdf).

#### Next meetup end of September
We are looking for speakers and a sponsor for our next meetup. Please contact
us if you are interested!
